00028 Text::Text (string content) : content_(content), proportionality_(FONT_PROPORTIONAL), wordRates_(vector<WordRate>(0))
00029 {
00030     // Initialize the vector of styles according to the number of characters in the content
00031     styles_ = vector<Style>(content.length());

00077 void Text::addCharacter (char character, Style style, unsigned int position)
00078 {
00079     // The desired position exceeds the content length, so we append to the of the text
00080     if(position > length())
00081     {
00082         content_ += character;
00083         styles_.push_back(style);
00084     }
00085     else
00086     {
00087         // Check for a valid position, though a compiler should use a big value when a negative
00088         // number is assigned to an unsigned int
00089         if (position < 0)
00090         {
00091             position = 0;
00092         }
00093                 
00094         // Declare two iterators for pointing to the desired position
00095         string::iterator contentIterator        = content_.begin();
00096         vector<Style>::iterator stylesIterator  = styles_.begin();
00097         
00098         // Advance the iterators until the desired position
00099         while (position > 1)
00100         {
00101             ++contentIterator;
00102             ++stylesIterator;
00103 
00104             --position;
00105         }
00106         
00107         // Insert the character and its style
00108         content_.insert(contentIterator, character);
00109         styles_.insert(stylesIterator, style);
00110     }
00111     
00112     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00113     computeWordRates();
00114 };

00132

00173 void Text::removeCharacter (unsigned int position)
00174 {
00175     // Check for a valid position
00176     if (position > length())
00177     {
00178         position = length();
00179     }
00180     
00181     // Declare two iterators for pointing to the desired character and its style
00182     string::iterator contentIterator        = content_.begin();
00183     vector<Style>::iterator stylesIterator  = styles_.begin();
00184     
00185     // Advance the iterators until the desired position
00186     while (position > 1)
00187     {
00188         ++contentIterator;
00189         ++stylesIterator;
00190         
00191         --position;
00192     }
00193     
00194     // Remove the character and its style
00195     content_.erase(contentIterator);
00196     styles_.erase(stylesIterator);
00197     
00198     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00199     computeWordRates();
00200 };

00213 Style Text::getCharacterStyle (unsigned int position) const
00214 {
00215     if (position >= length())
00216         return Style();
00217     else
00218         return styles_[position];
00219 };

00231 void Text::setCharacterStyle (unsigned int position, Style style)
00232 {
00233     if (position < length())
00234         styles_[position] = style;
00235 };

00338 void Text::updateWordRate (string word)
00339 {
00340     // Searches the word in the vector
00341     vector<WordRate>::iterator wordRates;
00342     for (wordRates = wordRates_.begin(); wordRates != wordRates_.end(); ++wordRates)
00343     {
00344         // Updates its appearance rate
00345         if ( (*wordRates).first == word )
00346         {
00347             (*wordRates).second++;
00348             return;
00349         }
00350     }
00351     
00352     // The word was not stored, so here we adds its first appearance
00353     wordRates_.push_back(WordRate(word, 1));
00354 };
00355 
00356 
00365 void Text::computeWordRates ()
00366 {   
00367     vector<string> words;   // Vector to hold our words after removing spaces
00368     
00369     // Extract the words in text
00370     tokenize(words);
00371     
00372     // Update appearance rate of every word extracted
00373     vector<string>::iterator wordsIterator;
00374     for (wordsIterator = words.begin(); wordsIterator != words.end(); ++wordsIterator)
00375         updateWordRate(*wordsIterator);
00376         
00377     // This sorting will improve future lookups
00378     sort (wordRates_.begin(), wordRates_.end());
00379 };
00380 
00381 
00386 void Text::tokenize(vector<string>& tokens, const string& delimiters) const
00387 {
00388     // Skip delimiters at the beginning of text
00389     string::size_type lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00390     
00391     // Find the first "non-delimiter"
00392     string::size_type pos     = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00393     
00394     // Traverse the content until reaching its end
00395     while (string::npos != pos || string::npos != lastPos)
00396     {
00397         // A word has been found, add it to the vector
00398         tokens.push_back(content_.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00399         
00400         // Skip delimiters again
00401         lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00402         
00403         // Find the next "non-delimiter"
00404         pos = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00405     }
00406 };
